required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial on the Articular Pain of Diagnosed Patients of Arthrosis
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Clinical Trial to Analyze the Efficacy of a Supplement Removed From the Internal Membrane of the Egg Shell on the Articular Pain of Diagnosed Patients of Arthrosis

lead_sponsor.agency: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

clinical_study.source: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia

brief_summary.textblock: Randomized, controlled, double-blind clinical trial of three parallel branches to analyze the efficacy of a supplement extracted from the internal membrane of the egg shell on the joint pain of patients diagnosed with osteoarthritis.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Pain from baseline at 8 weeks
primary_outcome.time_frame: The pain will be measured by a scale twice, at the beginning and at the end of the study (after an 8 week consumption).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: it will be measured twice, once at baseline or at the end of the study after 8 weeks of use
secondary_outcome.description: The quality of life of the subjects will be measured with the WOMAC test. It is a 24-item test that will measure the degree of pain on a scale of: nothing, little, enough, a lot, and a lot) when performing activities in daily life.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twice, once at the beginning of the trial in basal conditions and once at the end after 8 weeks of consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: The balance and mobility of the subjects will be measured with the Timed Up and Go Test

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Twice, once at the beginning of the trial in basal conditions and once at the end after 8 weeks of consumption.
secondary_outcome.description: the arterial pressure will be measured to the subjects

intervention.description: Subjects will consume a capsule for eight weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age over 18 years.
- Subjects diagnosed with osteoarthritis with functional grades I-III according to the modified criteria of the American College of Rheumatology.
- Subjects must have persistent knee pain associated with osteoarthritis with an initial score of at least 30 mm in the assessment of pain according to the EVA scale.
- The subjects should not present in their treatment narcotic drugs or steroidal anti-inflammatory or immunosuppressive drugs.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Serious or terminal illnesses.
- Subjects who are currently taking glucosamine, chondroitin sulfate, collagen or hyaluronic infiltrates or any supplement indicated for joint health.
- Subjects with chronic inflammatory diseases that affect the musculoskeletal system (rheumatoid arthritis, gout, pseudo-gout, Paget's disease, chronic pain syndrome, etc.).
- Subjects with a body mass index above 32.
- Subjects with a known allergy to eggs.
- Pregnant or lactating women.
- Inability to understand informed consent.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Universidad Católica San Antonio de Murcia
